page.title: 20Family leisure, The Narth
page.content: {Lesley - }I do lots of leisure activities and I enjoy all of them here are some of them; sewing, bicycle riding, guitar and recorder playing, girl guides and playing with my friends. I am 10 years old. {Mum -}My mum has many hobbies which she enjoys such as helping to organise playschool at Trelleck, wine making, sewing and reading books. {Dad -}My dad is on the Council Committee, he is Councillor Seymour. He enjoys gardening and laying paths in our acre of garden. {John -}John is my brother. He is nearly 12 years old. He likes to be by himself and does a lot of writing and drawing in his spare time. He also plays the guitar and watches television and likes to write programmes for his computer too. He has enjoyed doing The Domesday Project
